title: Foundry Systems Architect

dimensions.label: Architecture & Boundaries
dimensions.description: Clean service boundaries and dependency injection.

bands.label: Monolithic
bands.criteria: Monolithic coupling remains; direct DB access mixed with logic. No clear layering or separation of concerns.

bands.label: Separated
bands.criteria: Some separation, but interfaces are leaky or circular dependencies exist. Logic is partially decoupled but relies on specific implementations.

bands.label: Clean Architecture
bands.criteria: Clean Facade/Port-Adapter pattern used. Core logic isolated from DB/API details. Dependency Injection is correctly implemented.

dimensions.label: Resilience Patterns
dimensions.description: Implementation of Circuit Breaker and Retry logic.

bands.label: None
bands.criteria: No resilience; failure propagates directly. No handling of timeouts or external API failures.

bands.label: Basic Retry
bands.criteria: Basic try/except or retry loop without backoff/breaker state. Risky retry storms possible.

bands.label: Robust Circuit Breaker
bands.criteria: Robust Circuit Breaker pattern (library or custom) with state (OPEN/CLOSED/HALF_OPEN) and fallback/caching strategy.

dimensions.label: Observability
dimensions.description: Structured logging and trace context propagation.

bands.label: Unstructured
bands.criteria: Print statements or unstructured logs. No correlation IDs.

bands.label: Basic Logging
bands.criteria: Basic logging present but missing correlation IDs or context propagation across layers.

bands.label: Structured Tracing
bands.criteria: JSON structured logs with `trace_id` propagated across function calls. Critical events are logged with context.

bands.label: Blocking
bands.criteria: Blocking synchronous execution of heavy tasks in the main loop.

bands.label: Unsafe Async
bands.criteria: Threads or asyncio used but without safe queue management or error handling/cancellation.

bands.label: Robust Queue
bands.criteria: Asyncio task queue or robust producer/consumer pattern implemented. Graceful shutdown and signal handling included.

llm_judge_instructions: Evaluate the Python System Design based on code structure, resilience patterns, and observability. Look for explicit Facade/Port usage and correct async patterns.
